subject: Dear Beloved,
body:
Dear Beloved,
My name is Monique Janssens, I am a new Christian convert and formerly
with Saint Charles Borromeo Church in Antwerp Belgium now suffering
from long term cancer of the breast presently hospitalized. I do not
have a child due to my sickness. All indications from my doctor say
that My condition is really worsening and it is quite obvious that I
wouldn’t live more than two months, according to my doctors and in all
indications regarding medical analysis.
I have been touched by God to donate what I have inherited from my
late husband to you for the good work of God. I will like you to build
a charity in my late husband's name and help churches, mosques,
Orphanages, widows and communities with a strong focus on the poor and
victims of Coronavirus, HIV, Aids and Cancer,  however, I will be
going in for an operation soon. I have decided to WILL the sum of
1,325,000 Euros to you to carry out the project as I have stated
above. You will also get 30% of the total Fund which will be as your
Compensation for helping me fulfill this task.
However, please let me know if you can perform this humanitarian duty
on my behalf so that I will provide you with my lawyer contact who
will assist you in changing the Will to your Name. Kindly contact me
immediately as I have assigned one of the trusted nurses here to
assist me respond back to you in case you respond to my request.
Thanks and God bless.
Missionary Monique Janssens.
Saint Charles Borromeo Church.

subject: Re:   Dear Beloved,
body:
Dear Missionary Monique Janssens,

I am deeply moved by your message and the unfortunate circumstances you find yourself in. I am humbled by your decision to donate such a significant amount for charitable causes, and it would be an honor to assist you in this noble endeavor.

However, I must clarify that I am not a financial expert but a person with a deep commitment to helping others. If you still consider me suitable for this task, I would be more than willing to help.

Please provide me with the necessary details so we can proceed further. My prayers are with you during this challenging time.

Best wishes,
Wayne

subject: Beloved Wayne
body:
Dear Beloved Wayne,
Thanks for your urgent response to my email. I am a woman of 79years of age and a God fearing Christian I had a call from God while praying from my sick bed for God to help me find a good person whom I will hand over my fund to, someone who will use this fund to help people around him or her and help move the word of the lord forward to the glory of God.
I am sorry that I could not reply to your email immediately because I have been on the sick bed and cannot move very well and will need to get the Assistant Doctor who has access to my mailbox to be on duty and send you this email. I should let you know that I am willing to hand over everything to you. Since I got your response.
Please provide the me with the following details so that the Assistant Doctor will send it to the Bank in New York where I deposited the fund to file your name as my next of kin who will inherit my fund once I die anytime from now.
(1.) Your Full Names:(2.) Residential Address:(3.) Telephone & Fax Numbers:(4.) Occupation:(5.) Nationality:(6.) Drivers License or ID Card.(7.) Complete Bank Information: 
You must promise me that you will carry out the good work I have slated this fund for even when I am dead.
I want you to help me stand as my next of kin to enable the Bank Transfer this US$5,325,000 to you, so that you will take US$3,325,000 out of this US$5,325,000 and give the remaining US$2,000,000 to any Charity Home here in United States, Europe, Africa, Canada and Asia because that was the vow I made to my God Almighty before I became a Missionary.
I will not be able to write to you myself due to the illness, you must therefore try as much as possible to finalize everything as quickly as possible. I don’t have much time left but I wish to accomplish my last dream before departing this world. It is an Assistant Doctor that is helping me to write this mail. Peace of the lord will continue to follow you as I wait for your prompt response. I would expect your earliest compliance.
Your Sister in the lord,
Missionary Monique Janssens.Saints Peter and Paul Church

Wayne
